{{TagLine|802.11ax Wi-Fi 6 Enterprise AP}} :[https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/Wireless/Access_Points/WA6628/ Product page] {{•}} [http://www.h3c.com/cn/d_201803/1069824_30003_0.htm Press release] {{See also|List of 802.11ax Hardware}} ===News=== * [https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2018/06/26/qualcomm-and-new-h3c-ship-80211ax-enterprise-access-point ''New H3C Ship 802.11ax Enterprise Access Point'' on '''Qualcomm'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/first-draft-11ax-ap-to-ship-in-september.47425/ ''H3C WA6628 - First draft 11ax AP'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/06/27/qualcomm-ipq8078-h3c-wa6628-802-11ax-wifi-router-1000-clients/ ''H3C WA6628 802.11ax WiFi Enterprise Router'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ===See also=== :;[[H3C]] • [https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/Wireless/ Wi-Fi 6 AP] *[[H3C WA6528]]i (AX6000) • [https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/Wireless/Access_Points/WA6528i/ PPage] *[[H3C WA6622]] (AX3000) • [https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/Wireless/Access_Points/WA6622/ PPage] *[[H3C WA6628]] (AX6000) • [https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/Wireless/Access_Points/WA6628/ PPage] *[[H3C WA6638]] (AX6000) • [https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/Wireless/Access_Points/WA6638/ PPage] *[[Charter RAX1V1K]] *[[Huawei AP7060DN]] *[[NEC BL1000HW]] __NOTOC__
